title: Ski Troop Attack 1960 | Michael Forest, Frank Wolff, Wally Campo | Full Movie | Subtitles

sources.title: Ski Troop Attack 1960 | Michael Forest, Frank Wolff, Wally Campo | Full Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
An American patrol has to cross behind enemy lines by skis in order to blow up an important railroad bridge. The task is made harder by conflicts between the platoon's veteran sergeant and its inexperienced lieutenant and by constant attacks by pursuing German troops.

Original title: Ski Troop Attack (1960)

Colorized version https://youtu.be/iNxOI19VEhE

Director: Roger Corman
Writer: Charles B. Griffith
Stars: Michael Forest, Frank Wolff, Wally Campo 
Genres: Classics, Cult Film, Action, Adventure, War

Movie Review: https://letterboxd.com/cultcinemaclass/film/ski-troop-attack/
